# üí´ About Me:
Hi, I am Albet Novendo. I enjoy working on web development but am also open to mobile development and software projects in general. My expertise lies in Laravel, Tailwind, React, Vue, and more. I'm always eager to learn new technologies and stay up-to-date on the latest trends.

I've worked on various projects throughout my career, including developing websites, REST APIs, and other applications. I'm excited to continue my journey and keep learning about the latest technologies. Moreover, I'm also happy to help others learn about web or software development in general and to share my passion for this field.
